title.rendered: Day 1 – Adam Saaks Religion. Miami Swim Week

content.rendered:
Miami Swim Week Powered by Art Hearts Fashion Day 1. 

24Fashion TV Exclusive: 

Adam Saaks Religion


Designer Adam Saaks brought drama to the runway, live cutting and styling a swimsuit on Love and Hip Hop Miami Star, Princess Love, during the finale of his Adam Saaks Religion show. He demonstrated his creative cutting techniques that have become his signature. Deftly working a sharp pair of shears next to very sensitive areas, he gave the audience a private look into his creativity and showmanship.

Adam Saaks Religion Decades in the fashion industry, Adam Saaks has now teamed up with street brand, Religion Clothing from London to create a new collection for the contemporary luxury market. Saaks is famous for his love for live custom cutting performances and has made his mark in the fashion industry as one of the most unique talents the world has ever seen. Armed with only a pair of scissors, he has crisscrossed the globe wielding his razor sharp blades, spontaneously creating jaw-dropping designs in front of millions worldwide. Adam Saaks Religion - is New Fashion for a New Era...Love. Join Adam Saaks new form of Religion on the Miami runway for the first look at his newest cutting edge designs. Designer: Adam Saaks

Adam Saaks performs his masterpiece on Princess Love Norwood

Adam Saaks and Princess Love Norwood

Princess Love Norwood walks for Adam Saaks

Fashion model Karolina Derpienska walks for Adam Saaks

Fashion model Cameron Clark walks for Adam Saaks

Fashion model Ann Neika J.C. walks for Adam Saaks


Photo by Natalie Svors. Exclusively for 24Fashion TV.
